title: WWTF/ want to SEE Brown Old Mill.....
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: WWTF/ want to SEE Brown Old Mill.....
posts.post_content:
ok guys......

many attempts....but not 1 taker!:eek:



as you know I LOVE SCRAP! and rarities in T206....backs...ect..but have been searching for a whale for most over 10 years+


would love to see a brown old mill....would love even more to trade for one:)

I have plenty to offer......a beater is welcome;)

let's dance...

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

Peace

Johnny

p.s.

would love to just see a scan or two....if your not willing to part with now , I understand!

I know of a handful of collectors with one(8 or 9)

but there are a handful missing..

would love to see some1

Johnny- you love scrap? I had no idea.

;)
